page.title: 17RECREATION
page.content: Motor_bikes generally appeal to people of all ages. I own a motor_bike of my own. I use it in the back garden of my home which is fortunately large enough to do lots of jumps and obstacle courses. The bike's top speed is 30mph There are four different kinds of racing ; dirt_track racing,general racing, side_car racing and scrambling My bike is used for scrambling. You will find that many young people have motor_bikes. It is becoming a craze and I think that what has inspired people, is the B.B.C.'S programme 'Kick Start',in which children from about 9 to 15 years try to go over a scrambling course in the fastest possible time. My motor_bike is called a'Punch'. It is specially built for young people as it is only half the size of a normal scrambling bike.
